articles.title: PM Modi highlights transparency, trusted sources for better supply chains - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The summit at which the Indian PM spoke was attended by leaders of the European Union, the UK, Australia, Canada, Germany, Indonesia, Italy, Japan, the Netherlands, South Korea and Singapore | Latest News India
articles.content: In an apparent swipe at China, Prime Minister Narendra Modi has told a global summit on supply chain resilience that trusted sources and transparency are among key factors for enhancing global supply… [+4132 chars]

articles.author: Jan Cronje
articles.title: EU seeking to launch project to help SA phase out coal at COP26 climate summit - News24
articles.description: The European Union is looking to officially launch its project to help SA phase out coal at the COP26 climate summit which started on Sunday in Glasgow, Scotland.
articles.content:
The European Union is seeking to launch its project to help SA phase out coal at the COP26 climate summit which started on Sunday in Glasgow, Scotland.
